(api:gtk=2.8.2) 计时器

\~English

\~Chinese
(api:gtk=2.0.0) ASEva.Samples.VideoFrameSample 中的图像对象

\~English
Create image with the specified size and without alpha channel
\~Chinese
按指定宽高创建无alpha通道的图像

\~English
(api:gtk=2.1.0) Bind to common image object
\~Chinese
(api:gtk=2.1.0) 绑定通用图像，共享数据

\~English
Image width
\~Chinese
图像宽度

\~English
Image height
\~Chinese
图像高度

\~English
Number of bytes per row
\~Chinese
一行数据的字节数

\~English
Image data
\~Chinese
图像数据

\~English
(api:gtk=2.1.0) Whether it contains alpha channel
\~Chinese
(api:gtk=2.1.0) 是否含alpha通道

\~English
(api:gtk=2.5.6) Whether it's BGR inverted (i.e. RGB or RGBA)
\~Chinese
(api:gtk=2.5.6) BGR是否逆序 (即RGB或RGBA)

\~English
Convert to Gdk.Pixbuf object
\~Chinese
转换为Gdk.Pixbuf对象

\~English
Convert to Cairo.ImageSurface object. When you're done using it, call Dispose method to release
\~Chinese
转换为Cairo.ImageSurface对象，使用完毕后需调用Dispose方法进行释放

\~English
(api:gtk=2.0.0) UI panel for child window
\~Chinese
(api:gtk=2.0.0) 窗口控件，用于实现窗口组件的实际功能

\~English
(api:gtk=2.1.1) [Optional] Called while initializing panel's size
Configuration string \~Chinese
(api:gtk=2.1.1) [可选实现] 在初始化控件尺寸时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while getting default size (Use requested size if this method is not overridden)
The default size \~Chinese
[可选实现] 获取默认大小时被调用（若不实现默认大小即为最小尺寸）
默认大小

\~English
[Optional] Called while initializing the panel
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在配置界面控件初始化时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while getting the configuration string
Configuration string \~Chinese
[可选实现] 获取配置字符串时被调用
配置字符串

\~English
[Optional] Called while new data arrived. If there's a sample buffer, use ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin to remove data outside the buffer range after adding new sample. In addition, since ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI won't be called while the child window is hidden, you can use ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample to perform background processing (ManualTriggerSample's frequency is 50Hz)
New data, can be ASEva.GeneralSample , ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample , ASEva.Samples.AudioFrameSample , ASEva.Samples.PointCloudSample , ASEva.Samples.BusDataPack , ASEva.Samples.SignalsData , ASEva.EventData , ASEva.SceneData , etc. \~Chinese
[可选实现] 在获得新数据时被调用。如果存在样本缓存，则需要在添加至缓存后使用 ASEva.Sample.ClipWithBufferBegin 将缓存范围外数据移除。另外，由于窗口隐藏时将不会调用 ASEva.WindowPanel.OnUpdateUI ，所以可以在此函数中的data为 ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample 时进行后台处理（ManualTriggerSample频率为50Hz）
新数据，包括通用样本 ASEva.GeneralSample , 手动触发器样本 ASEva.Samples.ManualTriggerSample , 音频帧样本 ASEva.Samples.AudioFrameSample , 点云帧样本 ASEva.Samples.PointCloudSample , 总线数据 ASEva.Samples.BusDataPack , 信号数据 ASEva.Samples.SignalsData , 事件数据 ASEva.EventData , 场景片段描述 ASEva.SceneData 等类型

\~English
[Optional] Called while needed to reset data buffer
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要重置数据缓存时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while starting a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮开始时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while stopping a session
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在每轮结束时被调用

\~English
[Optional] Called while updating the panel's UI. All UI related updating should be put here. Note that this function won't be called when the child window is hidden
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在需要更新界面时被调用。所有与界面相关的更新应全部放在此函数内实现。需要注意，窗口隐藏时将不会调用此函数

\~English
(api:gtk=2.5.10) [Optional] Called in the main loop, for running modal dialog
\~Chinese
(api:gtk=2.5.10) [可选实现] 在主循环中被调用，可进行模态对话

\~English
[Optional] Called before destroying the panel
\~Chinese
[可选实现] 在窗口控件销毁前被调用

member.summary: Called when the mouse wheel is scrolled.

member.returns: true if the event was handled.
member.remarks: The way that scroll direction is determined is different between gtk2 and gtk3, hence the need for version-specific imlementations of GetMouseWheelEventArgs(Gdk.EventScroll) function.
